summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to City elections; changing the campaign period for calculating contribution limits and reporting; authorizing summary dismissal of certain complaints; requiring filing of a financial disclosure form with the City Clerk; revising hearing procedures; increasing assessments for late filings; regulating "office funds"; and making miscellaneous changes; amending Seattle Municipal Code Sections 2.04.010, - 070, -.090, -.170, -.220, -.300, -.330, -.370, -.500, -.510, and -.520, subsections B and D of Section 2.04.250, and adding new Sections 2.04.075, 2.04.375, and 2.04.480 and new subsections to sections 2.04.010 and 2.04.250; recodifying certain subtitle headings; and repealing Section 2.04.100 in connection therewith.
